body:
Comment 26: 
I do not think these errors (EPIPE or ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED) are special in any way.
If godoc see these, it should display error message to the user, as it does now.

I would love to help you, but I can't reproduce your problem. If you can provide
instructions for me to reproduce your problem with "less", I'll be happy to help. Until
then, I do not believe there is a problem with godoc or anything that is part of Go.

Alex
